transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello, Saban ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan, mam boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, aapka call aaya tha IndiaMART se. Ek aapke number se call aaya tha hamare paas abhi. To sir aapne call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Haan, mam call kiya tha mam.
Executive: Ji ji ji, bataiye sir. Aapne kuch package ke liye call kiya tha?
Customer: Bataiye kya hai?
Customer: Nahi hum bata rahe hamara ki package khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Ji, khatam hone wala hai sir.
Customer: To jyada recruitment roj roj aata tha abhi kamti ho gaya. Abhi recruitment nahi aa raha.
Executive: Sir ab aapki package khatam hone ja raha hai na IndiaMART ka. TrustSeal ka jo aapka do saal ka hai. To is vajah se. Aur kitna din baki hai?
Customer: Aur kitna din baki hai?
Executive: Sir aapka jo bacha hai is month ka hai. Services renewal aapka generate ho gaya IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan. To abhi IndiaMART ka ho gaya?
Customer: Haan. Sir TrustSeal two years ki services hai sir aapki. Sir aapka jo baithega 70,000 plus GST pe baithega services ka sir.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Achcha. 70,000 plus GST 82,600 ki baithegi service.
Customer: Nahi hum jaisa soch rahe hain, hum soch rahe hain ki hum ek saal ka liye karega. Fir ek saal baad aayega.
Executive: Sir ek saal wala to. Hmmm, boliye.
Customer: Bata rahe hum soch rahe hain ki ek saal mein hamara jyada lead aaye. Jyada kaam karne se ka do saal ke liye kahan jayenge? Fir ek saal hoga fir payment hum log to jaisa chalta rahe chal chalne chalega. Jaise ki hamara 10 year chal raha hai to chal raha hai. Aap log ko to aisa system nahi hai ye paisa bank se katata hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye karwana hai to aap karwa sakte hain iska ek saal ka. But hota kya hai na sir ek bas jaise jab aap do saal karwate hain to paisa kam padta hai sir matlab ek saal wala jo baithega sir wo aapko baithega 50 plus GST pe. Thik hai? Lekin kam lekin.
Customer: Lekin kam badhega to.
Executive: Haan kam sir to kam to dono services mein same hi cheez hai but time period bas badh jata hai na sir. Aur do saal ka jab aap lete hain to aapko paisa kam padega sir pay karne ke liye. Yahan pe aap 70 plus GST doge. Usme jo rahega aap ek saal ka 50 plus GST doge sir. Ab batao 50 50 plus GST aapne diya 59,000 aur udhar sir aapne 82,600 diya thik hai wahan pe. Sir aap khud hi socho ki kitna sir sirf 22,000 ka farak aa raha hai sir do saal ke mein. Thik hai? Abhi wahi cheez agar aap ek saal karwaoge fir agle saal karwaoge sir to aapka kya sir 1 lakh ka package baitha na yahan aap do saal ka kyunki 50 50 aap doge. Thik hai?
Customer: Hamara hamara ek saal ka agar hoga to hamara hamara to ye ho jayega na hamara to lead bhi achcha aayega.
Executive: Kyun aisa kyun sir ek saal mein kyun lead achcha aayega aur do saal mein kyun nahi aayega sir? Time period se kya matlab hai sir? Time period se to aapko paisa jo aap renew kar rahe ho uska kam hoga na ek saal chahe business aana hoga aapko ek saal mein bhi aayega do saal wale mein bhi aayega teen saal wale mein bhi aayega sir. Ye to sirf time period ka farak hai na sir service ka farak thodi hai isme.
Customer: Nahi hamara jaisa ki pakad lijiye hamara hamara direct call aaye thik hai.
Executive: Haan. Direct.
Customer: Direct call jyada aayega.
Executive: Haan. Ek saal mein kyun jyada aayega aur sir do saal mein kyun nahi? Sir main samajhna chah rahi hun aapko kyun lag raha hai ki ek saal mein jyada aayega aur do saal mein jyada nahi aayega samajh nahi pa rahi main.
Customer: Nahi dekhiye actual agar agar saal mein ek bar denge to uska jitna lead hota hai actual lead ka to dam hai na.
Executive: Haan sir 400 ki ek lead aati hai.
Customer: Haan. Lead ka 400.
Executive: Haan. Lead ka 400 aata hai to hamara jyada lead aap denge hamare ek saal baad baad hum renew karenge.
Customer: Hmmm. Sir to aapko abhi bhi 34 leads milegi aur jab aap ek saal wala lo tab bhi 34 hi milega do saal wala loge tab bhi 34 hi milega sir.
Customer: 34 milega bas.
Executive: Dono se to 34 34.
Customer: Nahi ek saal mein 34 milega do saal mein 34 milega.
Executive: Sir har hafte 34 milega na aapko per week ke basis pe. Haan. Achcha. Per week pe aapko 34 milega na total. To total jo aapke pure mahine ki lead rehti hai sir jo rahegi aapki wo rahegi sir aapki 136 lead per week ke basis pe hogi. Thik hai?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan. Aur pure saal ki agar isi cheez ko uthayenge to aapke paas totally 1600 1632 leads hogi aapki. Thik hai?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan. To ye aapki lead rahegi sir. Thik hai to agar aap ek saal wala lo ya do saal wala lo ek saal mein 160 1632 rahegi do saal mein bhi 1632 rahegi just double ho jayega sir uska. Nahi hum soch rahe hain ki mam hamara isse jo jo hamara package hai isse hi achcha package hamara chahiye.
Customer: To match achcha maximize lijiye sir. Sabse badhiya package hai wo usme aapko kya milega sir usme aapki listing bhi upar jayegi company ki thik hai usme aapko jo business aayega na wo samne se call aur inquiry se business aayega. Matlab customer samne se call karega aur inquiry karega aapse ki mujhe ye product ki zarurat hai aap ya aap jis bhi product mein business karte ho uski mujhe zarurat hai bataiye isme kya karna hai thik hai to wo karega ab usme kya hoga sir main batati hun usme aapki ek company ki puri website banegi thik hai jo IndiaMART aapko bana ke dega sir thik hai usme aapki website banegi website aapka proper banega sir usse kya hoga ki jaise abhi aapka hai IndiaMART pe hai Rama glass oil service thik hai website jab banegi to www haan haan ab jab ho jayegi to Ramagasoilservices.com chahiye ya dot in chahiye to ek website ban jayegi ki customer agar jab google pe search karega na ki gas line pipe installation services ke liye to uske samne Rama gas gas oil services open ho jayegi thik hai to ek website aapki achchi si ho jayegi usme kya hoga sir inquiry aayega aapko samne se customer ka aapko call aayega samne se wo inquiry karega aapse ki mujhe is product ki zarurat hai aap iska iska iska kitna package hai?
Customer: Main mam.
Executive: Sir dekho usme aapko TrustSeal complimentary milta hai char corporate email id milegi by lead usme sir aapko 44 by leads milti hai per week pe thik hai usme 44 per week ke basis pe milegi sir ek achchi website hum aapki company ki banayenge thik hai uske alava TrustSeal complimentary milega matlab TrustSeal bhi usme added hoga thik hai aur sir ye jo package hai sir ek saal wala jo baithta hai wo 75 plus GST pe baithta hai kyunki sir ye bada package hai thik hai aur jo aapka do saal wala hai wo aapka 110000 plus GST pe baithta hai sir.
Customer: Kitna mam?
Executive: Aapka jo ek saal wala hai wo 75 plus GST pe baithega aur jo do saal wala hai wo 110000 plus GST pe baithta hai. Thik hai? 75000 lagega.
Customer: 75 plus GST sir.
Executive: Haan. Par sir bada business hota hai usme usme business convert matlab samne se usme ye nahi rahega ki by lead to chaliye aap uthayenge uthayenge sir samne se customer call karega aur inquiry karega aapse aur usme qualified leads aapko milengi aur achchi leads milengi sir usme. Aur aap haan.
Customer: Bata rahe kal ab humko 2 baje tak call kijiye na ek bar.
Executive: Hmmm. Thik hai. Thik hai mam ye number aapka hai?
Customer: Ji sir ye to mere IndiaMART ke aapne customer care ko call kar diya tha to main abhi apne number se aapko call karti hun to proposal bheju aapko kya karna hai iska proposal ka main aapko bheju whatsapp pe ya mail karun kahan par?
Customer: Ab humko number dijiye kal baat kar kal lenge aap se phone wala achcha hoga thik hai.
Executive: Sir ek baat mujhe puchna tha aapke pehle account manager the Akhilesh Maurya thik hai unse aapki baat hoti thi right sir unse waise aapki bahut bar matlab baat hui hai ki thik hai chalo main payment kar dunga bahut bar aisa hua tha sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Haan usse baat karenge mam uska number hamare paas hai.
Executive: Kisse sir?
Customer: Aur jo Akhilesh se baat karenge.
Executive: Sir Akhilesh to hamare yahan kaam karte the na fir hamari company mein ab nahi hai wo. Main unki manager hi thi sir par main ye jaanna chah rahi thi ki unse bahut bar aapki baat hui thi but aap renew ka karwate the fir aap bolte the ki thik hai main UTR share kar raha hun but fir pata hi nahi tha payment ka kya ho jata tha sir kuch dikkat aati thi kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi payment nahi dikkat nahi aa raha hai to baat hogi hamara to khatam hone wala hai. Mera sala bola tha are kal to do mahina hai khatam ho jayega baat wala kar lega.
Executive: Achcha kyunki main dekh rahi thi aapke August mein bhi baat hui hai unse July mein bhi baat hui thi ki bas payment aap UTR number tak unko share kar rahe the but kuch ho paya nahi tha sir isiliye maine ek bar aap se pucha ki bar bar payment.
Customer: Nahi nahi baat hua tha. Hmmm. Haan. Ab hum kal kal pura baat chit kar lijiye thik hai. Wo kaam chhod diya kya?
Executive: Haan sir wo company mein nahi hai ab.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai mam aap humko miss call maar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai main aapko whatsapp pe bhej rahi hun detail aap ek bar check kariye kyunki ab to renewal hi hai sir aapka thik hai. Thik. Thik hai. Sir main keh rahi thi aapne na 9696 pe call kar diya hai to aapke paas na message jayega feedback ka please yes kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Thik hai thik hai main aapko whatsapp karti hun. [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART package is about to expire.

- Wants more leads in one year.

- Inquires about a better package.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of maximizing package.

- Executive provided details of TrustSeal complimentary.

- Executive offered to send a proposal on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, leads, trustseal, package
